Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about Isabella Rodriguez and Klaus Mueller are arranging to meet at the park for a yoga class on Thursday at 6 pm, with Isabella mentioning she will bring her yoga mat and water. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus, I was thinking more about that yoga class you mentioned. I really appreciate the invite and I'm looking forward to unwinding with some yoga on Thursday. What time should I meet you at the park?
Hey Isabella, I'm glad you're excited for the yoga class! Let's meet at the park at 6 pm on Thursday. Looking forward to it!
Great, 6 pm works perfectly for me. I'll make sure to bring my yoga mat and some water. Can't wait!
Looking forward to it! See you on Thursday at 6 pm.
